title: Cinefantastique Vol 06 No 4/Vol 07 No 1(Spring 1978)
creator: Cinefantastique
description: Double-issue feature a wealth of interviews with the cast and crew of Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope . Also includes interviews with Steven Spielberg and FX man Douglas Trumbull for Close Encounters of the Third Kind , animator David Allen for Laser Blast , director Alfred Sole for Communion (aka Alice Sweet Alice ), director William Girdler for The Manitou , actress Amy Irving for The Fury , an article on the stop-motion feature Planet of the Dinosaurs , reviews, news and more.
